thread.title: Faking It: Make a Big First Impression With a Small Budget
thread.title_full: Faking It: Make a Big First Impression With a Small Budget

author: Nicole Lapin
title: Faking It: Make a Big First Impression With a Small Budget
text:
Faking It: Make a Big First Impression With a Small Budget Look like a big shot without having to spend like one. Financial Journalist, New York Times Bestselling Author, Anchor   
In this video, Entrepreneur Network partner Nicole Lapin explains how a few simple strategies -- like hosting meetings in a hotel lobby rather than at a coffee shop like Starbucks or getting hold of a 212 area code to look like you're based in Manhattan when you really work in New Jersey -- can save you money and make a big first impression. 
To learn more, click play. 
Related: 5 Important Financial Questions to Ask Your Significant Other 
Entrepreneur Network is a premium video network providing entertainment, education and inspiration from successful entrepreneurs and thought leaders. We provide expertise and opportunities to accelerate brand growth and effectively monetize video and audio content distributed across all digital platforms for the business genre. 
EN is partnered with hundreds of top YouTube channels in the business vertical and provides partners with distribution on Entrepreneur.com as well as our apps on Amazon Fire , Roku and Apple TV . 
Click here to become a part of this growing video network. 
Nicole Lapin's new book, Boss Bitch , is available on Amazon. Nicole Lapin Nicole Lapin is a veteran financial journalist, serving as an anchor on CNN, CNBC and Bloomberg.
